None.Name: Ground Slam
None.Description: Activate to emit a shockwave, dealing 170 damage to units and 850 to structures in 15m radius, up to 1200 in total. Additionally the damage bonus against structures applies as well. Knocks back small and medium units. Only affects ground targets. Reusable every 30 seconds.
